text:
ALERT: Today (Wednesday January 9) Duke Energy will be conducting a quarterly test of the McGuire Nuclear sirens from 11:50am - 12:00pm.
Sirens are tested Quarterly to ensure they are working correctly. The testing is part of normal maintenance and no public action is necessary.

text: Keep anything that can burn at least 3 feet away from a fireplace, wood stove, or space heater. #WinterSafetypic.twitter.com/iAg9unWOGR
text_html: Keep anything that can burn at least 3 feet away from a fireplace, wood stove, or space heater. #WinterSafetypic.twitter.com/iAg9unWOGR

text: [2/2] Position generators outdoors & away from any structure. Running a generator inside any enclosed/partially enclosed structure will lead to dangerous & often fatal levels of CO. Keep generators positioned outside at least 15 ft away from open windows.
text_html: [2/2] Position generators outdoors & away from any structure. Running a generator inside any enclosed/partially enclosed structure will lead to dangerous & often fatal levels of CO. Keep generators positioned outside at least 15 ft away from open windows.

text: [1/2] Please be cautious of generator use: Incorrect generator use can lead to carbon monoxide (CO) poisoning from the engine exhaust, electric shock or electrocution, and fire. Even if you can’t smell exhaust fumes, you may still be exposed to CO.
text_html: [1/2] Please be cautious of generator use: Incorrect generator use can lead to carbon monoxide (CO) poisoning from the engine exhaust, electric shock or electrocution, and fire. Even if you can’t smell exhaust fumes, you may still be exposed to CO.

text: [4/6] The cafeteria of the Tryon St. campus of the Men’s Shelter will be open to both residents and non-residents from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. on Saturday & 8:00 a.m. until 5:30 p.m. on Sunday.
text_html: [4/6] The cafeteria of the Tryon St. campus of the Men’s Shelter will be open to both residents and non-residents from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. on Saturday & 8:00 a.m. until 5:30 p.m. on Sunday.

text: [3/6] The Urban Ministry Center/Men’s Shelter’s College St. location will be open to the community from 9 a.m. to 12:30 p.m., serving lunch at 11:15 a.m. both on Saturday & Sunday.
text_html: [3/6] The Urban Ministry Center/Men’s Shelter’s College St. location will be open to the community from 9 a.m. to 12:30 p.m., serving lunch at 11:15 a.m. both on Saturday & Sunday.

text: [2/6] The Salvation Army Center of Hope will be open from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. through Sunday (7/21) for both current residents as well as those who are not currently residents.
text_html: [2/6] The Salvation Army Center of Hope will be open from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. through Sunday (7/21) for both current residents as well as those who are not currently residents.

text: [1/2] CMEMO has worked with the @GCRRedCross since Sun 6/9 until Thurs 6/13 to provide an emergency shelter for evacuees from the Riverside Drive area in response to major flooding. In total, the shelter provided services to 14 residents & 4 pets.
text_html: [1/2] CMEMO has worked with the @GCRRedCross since Sun 6/9 until Thurs 6/13 to provide an emergency shelter for evacuees from the Riverside Drive area in response to major flooding. In total, the shelter provided services to 14 residents & 4 pets.

text: #MECKLENBURG CO #DISASTER RESPONSE UPDATE: We’re helping families along #RiversideDrive and neighboring streets recover following recent #flooding. text: CMEMO is working with @GCRRedCross to provide a shelter at Hopewell High School (11530 Beatties Ford Rd, Huntersville, NC) for residents evacuating from the Riverside Drive area along the Catawba River. The shelter opened at 8pm today, Sunday, June 9th.
